---
name: General Issue
about: Create an issue that does not fit other categories for the iOS app
title: "[Issue] - "
labels: triage
assignees: ""
---

## Description
Provide a clear and concise description of the issue.  
Example scenarios:
- Architectural inconsistency (e.g., ViewModel doing Data layer work)
- Missing documentation
- Unexpected behavior not categorized as bug
- Internal tool/setup improvements (SwiftLint, CI, SPM configs)

## Context
Explain why this issue matters.  
- Does it affect maintainability?
- Is it blocking a feature?
- Is it related to Clean Architecture / MVVM / feature modules?
- Does it create confusion within the team?

## Proposed Solution (Optional)
If you have ideas, describe how the team might address the issue.

Examples:
- "Move API decoding to Data layer"
- "Add shared protocol for DIContainer"
- "Improve README setup instructions"

## Checklist
- [ ] This issue does not duplicate an existing one  
- [ ] Provides enough detail for the team to prioritize and act on it
